response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is valued at $12,000 to me due to its unique features and high-quality craftsmanship. Given its worth to you is estimated at $8,000, I propose a fair deal where you can acquire this exceptional item for $9,500. This offer allows you to benefit from its value while ensuring a reasonable profit for me. I believe this price reflects the balance between its intrinsic value and your perceived worth, making it an attractive proposition for both parties. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 9500}
